text: Kenya Ordnance Factories Corporation (KOFC) is a state-owned defense corporation, the only ammunition manufacturer in Kenya, which is headquartered in Eldoret–Kitale Road 20 km from Eldoret, Kenya. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Military industry Category:Ammunition manufacturers Category:Industry in Kenya Category:Companies of Kenya Category:Military of Kenya Category:Companies established in 1997
title: Kenya Ordnance Factories Corporation
